name: SALTR Match 3
description:
SALTR Match 3 is game for SALTR apps & games personalization platform.

In SALTR Match 3 you can:
- Design and test levels with SALTR's Level Editor;
- Use different variants of levels;
- Adjust feature values;
- Reorder the levels;
- See your changes instantly in the game without updates;
- And much more!
